  • Method Details

    • serialize

      public static String serialize(User user)
      Serializes a User object into a string that can be saved to a text file. Format: Name||NRIC||Age||Marital Status||Password||UserType
      Parameters:
      user - The User object to serialize.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the User.

    • serializeApplicant

      public static String serializeApplicant(Applicant applicant)
      Serializes an Applicant into a string that can be saved to ApplicantList.txt. Format: Name||NRIC||Age||Marital Status||Password
      Parameters:
      applicant - The Applicant to serialize.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the Applicant.

    • serializeOfficer

      public static String serializeOfficer(HDBOfficer officer)
      Serializes an HDBOfficer into a string that can be saved to OfficerList.txt. Format: Name||NRIC||Age||Marital Status||Password
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDBOfficer to serialize.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the HDBOfficer.

    • serializeManager

      public static String serializeManager(ProjectManager manager)
      Serializes a ProjectManager into a string that can be saved to ManagerList.txt. Format: Name||NRIC||Age||Marital Status||Password
      Parameters:
      manager - The ProjectManager to serialize.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the ProjectManager.
